name: Endless (itch) (soart)
description:
”As you journey through the staircases and corridors, you slowly start to get mad, how many floors can there be? Where is the exit? Or even the entrance? It all started with that dam box, an ordinary looking box that needed some kinda-off white key to unlock. Not sure how to get it open you left it on a table, until one day your friend message you that he may have found the key. Yet now, you only want to wake-up from this seemingly impossible world.”

Endless is a first-person puzzle game, where you travel in endless corridors and staircases and try to figure a way out. Being not sure what may or may not lurk in the endlessness

Endless was created for the 2018 Epic MegaJam, Everything in the game outside of audio was created solely by me. I may choose to continue this game in the feature as I like the concept and have some great ideas for a future iteration, but we will have to see.

The game requires keyboard and mouse, there is also a known bug when saving the game and audio settings that they can and will get reset when restarting the game.

Its recommended to play the game with a headset and preferable in a dark room.
